description:
In the peaceful village of Melodyville, musicians are practising for an upcoming concert. Each musician is assigned a musical note represented by an integer. </br>
The harmony of the concert is disrupted when two musicians with adjacent notes have a "local discordance." A local discordance occurs when the absolute difference between 
the notes of two adjacent musicians are greater than or equal to the specified threshold. </br>
Your task is to find and print all pairs of musicians that have local discordances. Write a function findLocalDiscordances that takes an array of musical notes (integers) and a
 threshold as input and prints all pairs of musicians that have local discordances.


**`Sample Test Cases:`**

**`Input:`**

```
5

3 6 10 14 18

4
```

**`Output: `**

```
The index of the musicians that have local discordance.
In the above test case:

1 2

2 3

3 4
```

**`Constraints:-`**

- `The number of musicians (n) is between 2 and 1000.`
- `Each musical note is an integer between 1 and 10^9.`
- `The threshold (threshold) is a positive integer between 1 and 10^9.`
title: Musicians of Melodyville
